statements: UPDATE price_elasticity SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE price_elasticity SET demand = 500 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE price_elasticity SET revenue = 1500.75 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE price_elasticity SET price = price * 1.1, revenue = price * demand WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE price_elasticity SET demand = demand + 100 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE price_elasticity SET price = price - 2, revenue = price * demand WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE pricing_data SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE pricing_data SET quantity_sold = 50 WHERE product_id = 1002;
UPDATE price_elasticity SET elasticity = 0.75 WHERE product_id = 2001;
UPDATE pricing_data SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE pricing_data SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 20 WHERE product_id = 102
UPDATE price_elasticity SET elasticity = 0.5 WHERE product_id = 201
UPDATE PriceElasticityData SET price = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CompetitorPrices SET competitor_price = 15.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PriceElasticityData SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE quantity_sold >= 1000;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = 5 WHERE rating < 3;
UPDATE CompetitorPrices SET competitor_price = competitor_price * 0.9 WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
UPDATE price_elasticity_data SET price = 9.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE customer_data SET email = 'example@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;

UPDATE price_elasticity_data SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE customer_data SET email = CONCAT(customer_name, '@example.com') WHERE address = '123 Main St';
UPDATE competitor_prices SET price = price * 0.9 WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor X';
UPDATE PricingStrategies SET price = 50.99 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE ElasticityCoefficients SET elasticity_coefficient = 0.75 WHERE product_id = 456;
UPDATE CompetitorAnalysis SET market_share = 0.35 WHERE competitor_id = 789;
UPDATE PricingStrategies SET price = 150.25, sales_volume = 1000 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE ElasticityCoefficients SET elasticity_coefficient = 0.75, demand_curve = 'high' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE CompetitorAnalysis SET market_share = 0.2 WHERE competitor_id = 3;
